metadata.mission: Add comprehensive exception handling to prevent MCP server crashes when unexpected errors occur in research workflows and unified tool dispatch functions

metadata.description: Add top-level try/catch to 4 research workflow execute() methods to prevent crashes during workflow execution
Wrap execute() method body in try/except Exception, return WorkflowResult on error with workflow name and error_type in metadata
acceptance_criteria: Includes workflow='chat' and error_type in metadata

metadata.description: Wrap execute() method body in try/except Exception, return WorkflowResult on error
acceptance_criteria: Includes workflow='thinkdeep' and error_type in metadata

acceptance_criteria: Includes workflow='ideate' and error_type in metadata

metadata.description: Run pytest tests/core/research/workflows/ to confirm no regressions
Add catch-all exception handlers to 15 dispatch functions (research already protected) to prevent MCP server crashes
Add except Exception clause after ActionRouterError handling, return error_response with INTERNAL_ERROR
acceptance_criteria: Includes action and error_type in details
